name: BOMBasta - fun arena multiplayer
description:
Instant PVP multiplayer on diverse featured 3D arenas!
Do true total destruction of everything with your bombs!!
Choose funny cartoon bombers with unique skills!!!
Play online or with friends!!!!

Bombasta is a Super Blast Break thru in bomber-style games:

- True 3D! Run up, down, jump, fall and even fly! 

- Real blast propagation. Get cover behind any object or even other players!

- Total destruction. Blast everything that you see!

- Diverse arenas with various rules. Discover features of every arena and use them for your success.

- Find your favorite! Funny cartoon bombers with really unique skills.

- Play together with your friends in a private match or find opponents online

- Short rounds: 2-3 minutes. Have a few minutes? Have fun! 

- Rapid game start! Auto find an online match in 30 seconds

- Easy one-hand control! 

Play must be FUN!

AND MUCH MORE COMING IN FUTURE UPDATES! STAY TUNED!

Also available for mobiles at Apple Store and Google Play! Play everywhere!
